title: Aerosmith - Permanent Vacation OUTTAKES (FLAC) 4 cd set

Aerosmith

Permanent Vacation Outtakes

Date : 1987-xx-xx

A 3-disc set loaded with Permanent Vacation outtakes.
The songs are grouped by title, in order to see the evolution in the recording process.
